title: Obama's Relationship With Hispanic Voters Hinges On GOP
teaser: When you think about the party that has problems with Latino voters, it's usually the GOP. In 2012, they lost the Hispanic vote by more than 2 to 1, and long-term demographic changes could make that gap bigger. But President  Obama and the Democrats also have their own problems with the Hispanic vote.
